name: Guns and Rush
description:
Horde Combat Shooter

Face endless waves of monstrous adversaries as you fight to survive and progress through difficult levels.

Roguelike Mechanics

Each playthrough is unique! Explore procedurally generated environments, discover powerful weapons, and make strategic decisions to adapt to every game.

Bullet-Hell Intensity

Test your reflexes and precision amidst relentless bullet patterns and overwhelming odds.

Loot and Level-Up

Collect valuable resources, level up your character, and unlock new abilities to enhance your chances of survival.

20 Minutes of Thrills

Each level presents a 20-minute time limit, adding an element of urgency and excitement to every session.

Prepare yourself for an epic journey through the apocalypse, where danger lurks around every corner. Can you conquer the horde and emerge as the ultimate survivor?
